titleStmt.title: A godly and shorte treatise of the sacraments. vvritten by Robert Some..
titleStmt.author: Some, Robert, 1542-1609.

notesStmt.note: Colophon imprint: Imprinted at London at the Three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Dawson, for George Byshoppe. 1582.
Bound with an incomplete copy of STC 16814.5 following.
Imperfect: stained, and with print show-through.
Reproductions of original in the British Library (same copy filmed twice).
